about_the_game:
The classic puzzle game with modern controls and features!

Experience Minesweeper as you've always enjoyed it with a full field of quality of life improvements and new options:

  • Convenient Controls

    Minimize required clicks and react to information as quickly as you can process it by revealing or flagging a numbered space meeting its requirements to reveal or flag its remaining neighbors

  • Alternative Game Rules

    Tweak your level of challenge or work with hexagonal maps to keep things fresh and adapt to new patterns

  • Extensive High Scores

    Track your best runs for every unique ruleset offered at every map size

  • Keep it Consistent

    Hate corners? Enable optional wrapping (horizontally and/or vertically) to eliminate corners or even edges altogether!

  • Infinite Playspace

    Play forever in any direction with any ruleset, and discover just how far your skills can take you

  • Challenging Progression

    Multiple game modes allow you to tackle increasingly difficult challenges, or tackle any challenge you set for yourself

  • Take It Easy

    If you want to see things through to the end while learning or without giving it all your energy, easy mode will get you there!

  • Take Your Time

    If you don't want to feel rushed, all content can be used with Step Mode, where being patient and thorough reward you more than speed

  • Customize Your Look

    Customize the appearance and coloring of the tiles you use, for different vibes or to more easily see information important to you
